languages.text: "Они позволили сделать себя оружием в руках ксеносов". {n}Кибелла чеканит каждое слово как смертный приговор.{/n} "Слабость духа открыла путь врагам Его. Они отравлены этим и колдовством нелюдей".

traits.locale_text: "Они позволили сделать себя оружием в руках ксеносов". {n}Кибелла чеканит каждое слово как смертный приговор.{/n} "Слабость духа открыла путь врагам Его. Они отравлены этим и колдовством нелюдей".

languages.text: "They have let themselves be turned into a weapon in the hands of xenos." {n}Kibellah enunciates every word as if announcing a verdict.{/n} "Their lack of spirit has opened the way for His enemies. Thus, they are poisoned — both by their own weakness and by inhuman sorcery."
languages.original_text: "Они позволили сделать себя оружием в руках ксеносов". {n}Кибелла чеканит каждое слово как смертный приговор.{/n} "Слабость духа открыла путь врагам Его. Они отравлены этим и колдовством нелюдей".

traits.locale_text: "They have let themselves be turned into a weapon in the hands of xenos." {n}Kibellah enunciates every word as if announcing a verdict.{/n} "Their lack of spirit has opened the way for His enemies. Thus, they are poisoned — both by their own weakness and by inhuman sorcery."

"They have let themselves be turned into a weapon in the hands of xenos." {n}Kibellah enunciates every word as if announcing a verdict.{/n} "Their lack of spirit has opened the way for His enemies. Thus, they are poisoned — both by their own weakness and by inhuman sorcery."

"They have let themselves be turned into a weapon in the hands of xenos." {n}Kibellah enunciates every word as if announcing a verdict.{/n} "Their lack of spirit has opened the way for His enemies. Thus, they are poisoned — both by their own weakness and by inhuman sorcery."

"They have let themselves be turned into a weapon in the hands of xenos." {n}Kibellah enunciates every word as if announcing a verdict.{/n} "Their lack of spirit has opened the way for His enemies. Thus, they are poisoned — both by their own weakness and by inhuman sorcery."

languages.text: «Se han dejado convertir en un arma en manos de los xenos». {n}Kibellah enuncia cada palabra como si se tratase de un edicto.{/n} «Su falta de espíritu ha abierto el camino a Sus enemigos. Están envenenados: tanto por su propia debilidad como por la brujería inhumana».
languages.original_text: "They have let themselves be turned into a weapon in the hands of xenos." {n}Kibellah enunciates every word as if announcing a verdict.{/n} "Their lack of spirit has opened the way for His enemies. Thus, they are poisoned — both by their own weakness and by inhuman sorcery."

traits.locale_text: «Se han dejado convertir en un arma en manos de los xenos». {n}Kibellah enuncia cada palabra como si se tratase de un edicto.{/n} «Su falta de espíritu ha abierto el camino a Sus enemigos. Están envenenados: tanto por su propia debilidad como por la brujería inhumana».

languages.text: 「彼らは異種族の手によって武器にされてしまいました」{n}キベラはまるで評決を下すかのように、一言一句を強調した。{/n}「彼らの精神の欠如が、主の敵に道を開いてしまった。ゆえに、彼らは毒されている…自らの弱さと、非人間的な魔術によって」
languages.original_text: "They have let themselves be turned into a weapon in the hands of xenos." {n}Kibellah enunciates every word as if announcing a verdict.{/n} "Their lack of spirit has opened the way for His enemies. Thus, they are poisoned — both by their own weakness and by inhuman sorcery."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは異種族の手によって武器にされてしまいました」{n}キベラはまるで評決を下すかのように、一言一句を強調した。{/n}「彼らの精神の欠如が、主の敵に道を開いてしまった。ゆえに、彼らは毒されている…自らの弱さと、非人間的な魔術によって」

languages.text: “他们任由自己沦为异形手中的武器。”{n}绮贝菈说出的每个字，都仿佛在宣判一样。{/n}“他们的意志过于软弱，为祂的敌人铺平了道路。正因如此，他们遭到了毒害，既是被他们自己的软弱所害，也是被异形的巫术所害。”
languages.original_text: "They have let themselves be turned into a weapon in the hands of xenos." {n}Kibellah enunciates every word as if announcing a verdict.{/n} "Their lack of spirit has opened the way for His enemies. Thus, they are poisoned — both by their own weakness and by inhuman sorcery."

traits.locale_text: “他们任由自己沦为异形手中的武器。”{n}绮贝菈说出的每个字，都仿佛在宣判一样。{/n}“他们的意志过于软弱，为祂的敌人铺平了道路。正因如此，他们遭到了毒害，既是被他们自己的软弱所害，也是被异形的巫术所害。”

languages.text: "Sie haben sich zu einer Waffen in den Händen von Xenos machen lassen." {n}Kibellah betont jedes Wort, als würde sie ein Urteil sprechen.{/n} "Ihr mangelndes Engagement hat Seinen Feinden den Weg geebnet. Und nun sind sie vergiftet ... durch ihre eigene Schwäche und unmenschliche Zauber."
languages.original_text: "They have let themselves be turned into a weapon in the hands of xenos." {n}Kibellah enunciates every word as if announcing a verdict.{/n} "Their lack of spirit has opened the way for His enemies. Thus, they are poisoned — both by their own weakness and by inhuman sorcery."

traits.locale_text: "Sie haben sich zu einer Waffen in den Händen von Xenos machen lassen." {n}Kibellah betont jedes Wort, als würde sie ein Urteil sprechen.{/n} "Ihr mangelndes Engagement hat Seinen Feinden den Weg geebnet. Und nun sind sie vergiftet ... durch ihre eigene Schwäche und unmenschliche Zauber."

languages.text: « Ils ont accepté de devenir une arme entre les mains des xénos. » {n}Kibellah parle comme si elle rendait un jugement.{/n} « Leur faiblesse d'esprit a ouvert la voie à Ses ennemis. Et ainsi ont-ils été doublement empoisonnés, autant par leur propre médiocrité que par une sorcellerie inhumaine. »
languages.original_text: "They have let themselves be turned into a weapon in the hands of xenos." {n}Kibellah enunciates every word as if announcing a verdict.{/n} "Their lack of spirit has opened the way for His enemies. Thus, they are poisoned — both by their own weakness and by inhuman sorcery."

traits.locale_text: « Ils ont accepté de devenir une arme entre les mains des xénos. » {n}Kibellah parle comme si elle rendait un jugement.{/n} « Leur faiblesse d'esprit a ouvert la voie à Ses ennemis. Et ainsi ont-ils été doublement empoisonnés, autant par leur propre médiocrité que par une sorcellerie inhumaine. »

languages.text: "Zenoların ellerinde silah görevi görmeyi kabul ettiler." {n}Kibellah, her bir kelimeyi hüküm açıklıyormuş misali telaffuz ediyor.{/n} "Cesaretten yoksun oluşları, O'nun düşmanlarına fırsat sundu. Bundandır ki hem kendi zayıflıklarının hem de insan dışı sahirliğin zehrine maruz kaldılar."
languages.original_text: "They have let themselves be turned into a weapon in the hands of xenos." {n}Kibellah enunciates every word as if announcing a verdict.{/n} "Their lack of spirit has opened the way for His enemies. Thus, they are poisoned — both by their own weakness and by inhuman sorcery."
